catList: Majority of companies in economy are Family Businesses. Family ownership of a business has advantages & challenges. During this course, we will discuss what family business is & what the specific challenges are. The goal of this course is to examine the elements of family  business management environment. This course will extend student's understanding of dynamics of business, family & their interactions. There will be guests from family businesses at the class to support class discussions and there will be field trips to family businesses.
